biblioBesch.Transform.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT v_sos.mtknr AS PerID, v_sos.res12 AS PerAkaVor, v_sos.res5 AS gradfh, v_sos.vorname AS PerVor, v_sos.nachname AS PerNac, v_sos.geschl AS Geschl, v_sos.mtknr AS MtkNr, v_sos.res11 As PersonalStatus, v_sos.res13 AS AppStatusID, v_sos.gebdat AS GebDat, v_sos.gebort AS GebOrt, v_sos.gebland AS GebLandID, v_sos.staat AS NationID FROM v_sos, promotion WHERE v_sos.mtknr=promotion.mtknr AND promotion.promotionid=[promotion.promotionid] ORDER BY PerNac

AnnahmeErklaerung.Transform.SQL:
SELECT DISTINCT v_sos.mtknr AS PerID, v_sos.res12 AS PerAkaVor, v_sos.res5 AS gradfh, v_sos.vorname AS PerVor, v_sos.nachname AS PerNac, v_sos.geschl AS Geschl, v_sos.mtknr AS MtkNr, v_sos.res11 As PersonalStatus, v_sos.res13 AS AppStatusID, v_sos.gebdat AS GebDat, v_sos.gebort AS GebOrt, v_sos.gebland AS GebLandID, v_sos.staat AS NationID FROM v_sos, promotion WHERE v_sos.mtknr=promotion.mtknr AND promotion.promotionid = [where] ORDER BY PerNac
Bestätigung Annahme als Doktorand oder Doktorandin [MyPromo.ID] promotion.promotionid AnnahmeErklaerung

AnnahmeErklaerungZusatz.Transform.SQL:
SELECT DISTINCT v_sos.mtknr AS PerID, v_sos.res12 AS PerAkaVor, v_sos.res5 AS gradfh, v_sos.vorname AS PerVor, v_sos.nachname AS PerNac, v_sos.geschl AS Geschl, v_sos.mtknr AS MtkNr, v_sos.res11 As PersonalStatus, v_sos.res13 AS AppStatusID, v_sos.gebdat AS GebDat, v_sos.gebort AS GebOrt, v_sos.gebland AS GebLandID, v_sos.staat AS NationID FROM v_sos, promotion WHERE v_sos.mtknr=promotion.mtknr AND promotion.promotionid = [where] ORDER BY PerNac
Bestätigung Annahme als Doktorand oder Doktorandin mit zusätzlichen Leistungen [MyPromo.ID] promotion.promotionid AnnahmeErklaerungZusatz

Ablehnung.Transform.SQL:
SELECT DISTINCT bewerber.bid AS PerID, bewerber.gradid AS PerAkaVor, bewerber.gradfh AS gradfh, bewerber.vorname AS PerVor, bewerber.nachname AS PerNac, bewerber.geschl AS Geschl, bewerber.mtknr AS MtkNr, bewerber.status As PersonalStatus, bewerber.applicantstatusid AS AppStatusID, bewerber.gebdat AS GebDat, bewerber.gebort AS GebOrt, bewerber.gebland AS GebLandID, bewerber.staat AS NationID, promotion.promotionid AS PromoID FROM bewerber, promotion WHERE bewerber.bid=promotion.bid AND bewerber.bid = [where] ORDER BY PerNac
SELECT DISTINCT ktxt AS Titel FROM k_titel WHERE titelid = [IDTitel]
SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS AkadGradVor FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid = [PerAkaVor]
SELECT DISTINCT kontakt.kid AS KontID, kontakt.plz As PLZ, kontakt.ort As Ort, kontakt.strasse As Strasse, kontakt.telefon As Telefon, kontakt.fax As Fax, kontakt.email As eMail, kontakt.tabpk AS PerID FROM kontakt WHERE kontakt.tabpk = [PerID] AND kontakt.tabelle='bewerber' AND kontakt.typadrid = 0
SELECT DISTINCT promotion.promotionid AS ID, promotion.institute AS Institut, promotion.promoprogramm AS promoprogramm, promotion.promoprogrammdetail AS promoprogrammdetail, promotion.framework AS framework, promotion.frameworkdetail AS frameworkdetail, promotion.field AS field, promotion.gradid AS AkadGradID, promotion.title as Titel, promotion.mentor1id AS MentorID1, promotion.mentor2id AS MentorID2, promotion.mentor3id AS MentorID3, promotion.evaluator1id AS EvalID1, promotion.evaluator2id AS EvalID2, promotion.evaluator3id AS EvalID3, promotion.evaluator4id AS EvalID4, promotion.vorsitzid AS VorsitzID, promotion.zeitstempel AS Zeitstempel, promotion.personid AS PersonID, '' AS StatusID, '' AS StatusTxt, '' AS StatusProzessID, promotion.einrichtungid AS EinrichtungID, promotion.finalgrade AS FinalGrade FROM promotion WHERE promotion.bid = [PerID]
SELECT DISTINCT ltxt AS AkadGrad, ktxt AS AkadGradKurz FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid = [AkadGradID]
SELECT DISTINCT pid AS ID, nachname, namenbestand, vorname, titelid AS TitelID, personal.gradid AS AkadGradID, personal.gradid_nach AS AkadGradNachID, personal.geschl AS Geschl FROM personal WHERE personal.pid = [MentorID1]
SELECT DISTINCT ktxt AS Titel FROM k_titel WHERE titelid = [TitelID]
SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS AkadGradVor FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid = [AkadGradID]
SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS AkadGradNach FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid = [AkadGradNachID]
SELECT DISTINCT pid AS ID, nachname, namenbestand, vorname, titelid AS TitelID, personal.gradid AS AkadGradID, personal.gradid_nach AS AkadGradNachID, personal.geschl AS Geschl FROM personal WHERE personal.pid = [MentorID2]
SELECT DISTINCT ktxt AS Titel FROM k_titel WHERE titelid = [TitelID]
SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS AkadGradVor FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid = [AkadGradID]
SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS AkadGradNach FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid = [AkadGradNachID]
SELECT DISTINCT pid AS ID, nachname, namenbestand, vorname, titelid AS TitelID, personal.gradid AS AkadGradID, personal.gradid_nach AS AkadGradNachID, personal.geschl AS Geschl FROM personal WHERE personal.pid = [MentorID3]
SELECT DISTINCT ktxt AS Titel FROM k_titel WHERE titelid = [TitelID]
SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS AkadGradVor FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid = [AkadGradID]
SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS AkadGradNach FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid = [AkadGradNachID]
SELECT DISTINCT pid AS ID, '1' AS Nr, nachname, namenbestand, vorname, titelid AS TitelID, personal.gradid AS AkadGradID, personal.gradid_nach AS AkadGradNachID, personal.geschl AS Geschl FROM personal WHERE personal.pid = [EvalID1]
SELECT DISTINCT ktxt AS Titel FROM k_titel WHERE titelid = [TitelID]
SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS AkadGradVor FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid = [AkadGradID]
SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS AkadGradNach FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid = [AkadGradNachID]
SELECT strasse, plz, ort FROM kontakt WHERE tabelle='personal' AND tabpk=[ID]
SELECT DISTINCT pid AS ID, '2' AS Nr, nachname, namenbestand, vorname, titelid AS TitelID, personal.gradid AS AkadGradID, personal.gradid_nach AS AkadGradNachID, personal.geschl AS Geschl FROM personal WHERE personal.pid = [EvalID2]
SELECT DISTINCT ktxt AS Titel FROM k_titel WHERE titelid = [TitelID]
SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS AkadGradVor FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid = [AkadGradID]
SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS AkadGradNach FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid = [AkadGradNachID]

SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS AkadGradNach FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid = [AkadGradNachID]
SELECT strasse, plz, ort FROM kontakt WHERE tabelle='personal' AND tabpk=[ID]

SELECT DISTINCT ktxt AS Titel FROM k_titel WHERE titelid = [TitelID]

SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS AkadGradNach FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid = [AkadGradNachID]

SELECT DISTINCT pid AS ID, nachname, namenbestand, vorname, titelid AS TitelID, personal.gradid AS AkadGradID, personal.gradid_nach AS AkadGradNachID, personal.geschl AS Geschl FROM personal WHERE personal.pid = [VorsitzID]
SELECT DISTINCT ktxt AS Titel FROM k_titel WHERE titelid = [TitelID]
SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS AkadGradVor FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid = [AkadGradID]
SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS AkadGradNach FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid = [AkadGradNachID]
SELECT DISTINCT promotion.applicationOfAssumption AS applicationOfAssumption, promotion.assumptionCommitee AS assumptionCommitee, promotion.applicationOfAdmission AS applicationOfAdmission, promotion.openingOfProcedure AS openingOfProcedure, promotion.forwardingOfFile AS forwardingOfFile, promotion.forwardingForCommitee AS forwardingForCommitee, promotion.dateOfColloquium AS dateOfColloquium, promotion.dateOfPublishing AS dateOfPublishing, promotion.handoverToLibrary AS handoverToLibrary, promotion.dateForCertificate AS dateForCertificate, promotion.fileToArchive AS fileToArchive, promotion.archiveNumber AS archiveNumber FROM promotion WHERE promotion.promotionid=[ID]
SELECT DISTINCT id, txt, sort FROM add_infos WHERE tabpk=[ID] AND tab='promotion' AND type='Z' ORDER BY sort,txt
SELECT DISTINCT id, txt, sort FROM add_infos WHERE tabpk=[ID] AND tab='promotion' AND type='A' ORDER BY sort,txt
SELECT DISTINCT id, txt, sort FROM add_infos WHERE tabpk=[ID] AND tab='promotion' AND type='N' ORDER BY sort,txt
SELECT blobs.txt AS Mahnung FROM blobs, r_blob WHERE blobs.blobid = r_blob.blobid AND r_blob.tabelle = 'drucktexte' AND r_blob.tabpk = [EinrichtungID] AND r_blob.spalte='mahnung'
SELECT DISTINCT personal.pid AS PerID, personal.gradid AS AkadGradID, personal.gradid_nach AS AkadGradNachID, personal.gradfh AS gradfh, personal.vorname AS PerVor, personal.nachname AS PerNac, personal.namenbestand AS PerNam, personal.geschl AS Geschl, personal.mtknr AS MtkNr, personal.perstatusid As PersonalStatus, personal.applicantstatusid AS AppStatusID, personal.status As Status, personal.titelid AS IDTitel, personal.namenbestand AS Bestandteil, personal.gebdat AS GebDat, personal.gebort AS GebOrt, personal.gebland AS GebLandID, personal.staat AS NationID, personal.einrichtungid AS eid FROM personal WHERE personal.pid = [session_ident_M]
SELECT DISTINCT ktxt AS Titel FROM k_titel WHERE titelid = [IDTitel]
SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS AkadGradVor FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid = [AkadGradID]
SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS AkadGradNach FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid = [AkadGradNachID]
SELECT DISTINCT kontakt.kid AS KontID, kontakt.aikz As Aktiv, kontakt.plz As PLZ, kontakt.ort As Ort, kontakt.strasse As Strasse, kontakt.telefon As Telefon, kontakt.fax As Fax, kontakt.email As eMail, kontakt.hyperlink As Hyperlink, kontakt.adrzusatz AS Zusatz, kontakt.tabelle AS Tab, kontakt.typadrid As TypAdr, kontakt.tabpk, personal.pid AS PerID FROM kontakt, personal WHERE personal.pid = kontakt.tabpk AND (kontakt.aikz='A' OR kontakt.aikz IS NULL) AND kontakt.tabelle IN ('personal') AND kontakt.tabpk = [PerID]
SELECT DISTINCT id AS eID, dtxt, ltxt, farbe, utxt FROM einrichtung WHERE id = [eid]
Ablehnungsbescheid [MyPromo.ID] promotion.promotionid Ablehnung

Certificate.Transform.SQL:
SELECT DISTINCT v_sos.mtknr AS PerID, v_sos.res12 AS PerAkaVor, v_sos.res5 AS gradfh, v_sos.vorname AS PerVor, v_sos.nachname AS PerNac, v_sos.geschl AS Geschl, v_sos.mtknr AS MtkNr, v_sos.res11 As PersonalStatus, v_sos.res13 AS AppStatusID, v_sos.gebdat AS GebDat, v_sos.gebort AS GebOrt, v_sos.gebland AS GebLandID, v_sos.staat AS NationID FROM v_sos, promotion WHERE v_sos.mtknr=promotion.mtknr AND promotion.promotionid = [where] ORDER BY PerNac
SELECT '[nachname]' AS Nachname, '[vorname]' AS Vorname, '[lang]' AS Language, '[title]' AS Titel, '[ia]' AS Rolle
SELECT bewertung_id AS BewertungID, bewertungsart_id AS ArtID, bewertungsart.key AS Key, bewertungsart.sort AS Order, bewertungsart.dtxt AS Art, bewertung.dtxt AS Bewertung FROM (gratings LEFT JOIN bewertungsart ON (gratings.bewertungsart_id=bewertungsart.id)) LEFT JOIN bewertung ON (gratings.bewertung_id=bewertung.id) WHERE promotion_id=[promotion.promotionid] ORDER BY bewertungsart.sort::integer
Bescheinigung über erbrachte Leistungen [MyPromo.ID] promotion.promotionid Certificate

SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS PersonalStatusTxt FROM k_applicantstatus WHERE applicantstatusid = [AppStatusID]

SELECT DISTINCT v_anschri.anschrinr AS KontID, v_anschri.plz As PLZ, v_anschri.ort As Ort, v_anschri.strasse As Strasse, v_anschri.tel As Telefon, v_anschri.fax As Fax, v_anschri.email As eMail, v_anschri.mtknr AS PerID FROM v_sos, v_anschri WHERE v_sos.mtknr=v_anschri.mtknr AND v_anschri.mtknr = [PerID] AND v_anschri.anschrkz = 'H'

SELECT DISTINCT promotion.promotionid AS ID, promotion.institute AS Institut, promotion.promoprogramm AS promoprogramm, promotion.promoprogrammdetail AS promoprogrammdetail, promotion.framework AS framework, promotion.frameworkdetail AS frameworkdetail, promotion.field AS field, promotion.gradid AS AkadGradID, promotion.title as Titel, promotion.mentor1id AS MentorID1, promotion.mentor2id AS MentorID2, promotion.mentor3id AS MentorID3, promotion.evaluator1id AS EvalID1, promotion.evaluator2id AS EvalID2, promotion.evaluator3id AS EvalID3, promotion.evaluator4id AS EvalID4, promotion.vorsitzid AS VorsitzID, promotion.zeitstempel AS Zeitstempel, promotion.personid AS PersonID, '' AS StatusID, '' AS StatusTxt, '' AS StatusProzessID, promotion.einrichtungid AS EinrichtungID, promotion.finalgrade AS FinalGrade, promotion.k_abstgv_id AS StgId FROM promotion WHERE promotion.mtknr = [PerID]

SELECT DISTINCT pid AS ID, nachname, namenbestand, vorname, titelid AS TitelID, personal.gradid AS AkadGradID, personal.gradid_nach AS AkadGradNachID, personal.geschl AS Geschl FROM personal WHERE personal.pid = [MentorID3]
SELECT DISTINCT ktxt AS Titel FROM k_titel WHERE titelid = [TitelID]
SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS AkadGradVor FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid = [AkadGradID]
SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS AkadGradNach FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid = [AkadGradNachID]
SELECT DISTINCT pid AS ID, '1' AS Nr, nachname, namenbestand, vorname, titelid AS TitelID, personal.gradid AS AkadGradID, personal.gradid_nach AS AkadGradNachID, personal.geschl AS Geschl FROM personal WHERE personal.pid = [EvalID1]

SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS AkadGradVor FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid = [AkadGradID]
SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS AkadGradNach FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid = [AkadGradNachID]
SELECT strasse, plz, ort, adrzusatz2 AS Institut, adrzusatz, einrichtung FROM kontakt WHERE tabelle='personal' AND tabpk=[ID]

SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS AkadGradNach FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid = [AkadGradNachID]

SELECT DISTINCT ktxt AS Titel FROM k_titel WHERE titelid = [TitelID]
SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS AkadGradVor FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid = [AkadGradID]
SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS AkadGradNach FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid = [AkadGradNachID]

SELECT DISTINCT ktxt AS Titel FROM k_titel WHERE titelid = [TitelID]
SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS AkadGradVor FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid = [AkadGradID]
SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS AkadGradNach FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid = [AkadGradNachID]

SELECT DISTINCT pid AS ID, nachname, namenbestand, vorname, titelid AS TitelID, personal.gradid AS AkadGradID, personal.gradid_nach AS AkadGradNachID, personal.geschl AS Geschl FROM personal WHERE personal.pid = [VorsitzID]
SELECT DISTINCT ktxt AS Titel FROM k_titel WHERE titelid = [TitelID]
SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS AkadGradVor FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid = [AkadGradID]
SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS AkadGradNach FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid = [AkadGradNachID]
SELECT DISTINCT promotion.applicationOfAssumption AS applicationOfAssumption, promotion.assumptionCommitee AS assumptionCommitee, promotion.applicationOfAdmission AS applicationOfAdmission, promotion.openingOfProcedure AS openingOfProcedure, promotion.forwardingOfFile AS forwardingOfFile, promotion.forwardingForCommitee AS forwardingForCommitee, promotion.dateOfColloquium AS dateOfColloquium, promotion.dateOfPublishing AS dateOfPublishing, promotion.handoverToLibrary AS handoverToLibrary, promotion.handovertype AS handoverType, promotion.handovercount AS handoverCount, promotion.dateForCertificate AS dateForCertificate, promotion.fileToArchive AS fileToArchive, promotion.archiveNumber AS archiveNumber FROM promotion WHERE promotion.promotionid=[ID]
SELECT DISTINCT id, txt, sort FROM add_infos WHERE tabpk=[ID] AND tab='promotion' AND type='Z' ORDER BY sort,txt
SELECT DISTINCT id, txt, sort FROM add_infos WHERE tabpk=[ID] AND tab='promotion' AND type='A' ORDER BY sort,txt
SELECT DISTINCT id, txt, sort FROM add_infos WHERE tabpk=[ID] AND tab='promotion' AND type='N' ORDER BY sort,txt
SELECT blobs.txt AS Mahnung FROM blobs, r_blob WHERE blobs.blobid = r_blob.blobid AND r_blob.tabelle = 'drucktexte' AND r_blob.tabpk = [EinrichtungID] AND r_blob.spalte='mahnung'
SELECT DISTINCT id AS eID, dtxt, ltxt, farbe, utxt FROM einrichtung WHERE id = [EinrichtungID]
SELECT DISTINCT abstgvnr AS ID, dtxt, ltxt FROM v_k_abstgv WHERE abstgvnr = [StgId]

SELECT DISTINCT personal.pid AS PerID, personal.gradid AS AkadGradID, personal.gradid_nach AS AkadGradNachID, personal.gradfh AS gradfh, personal.vorname AS PerVor, personal.nachname AS PerNac, personal.namenbestand AS PerNam, personal.geschl AS Geschl, personal.mtknr AS MtkNr, personal.perstatusid As PersonalStatus, personal.applicantstatusid AS AppStatusID, personal.status As Status, personal.titelid AS IDTitel, personal.namenbestand AS Bestandteil, personal.gebdat AS GebDat, personal.gebort AS GebOrt, personal.gebland AS GebLandID, personal.staat AS NationID, personal.einrichtungid AS eid FROM personal WHERE personal.pid = [session_ident_M]
SELECT DISTINCT ktxt AS Titel FROM k_titel WHERE titelid = [IDTitel]
SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS AkadGradVor FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid = [AkadGradID]
SELECT DISTINCT dtxt AS AkadGradNach FROM k_akadgrad WHERE gradid = [AkadGradNachID]
SELECT DISTINCT kontakt.kid AS KontID, kontakt.aikz As Aktiv, kontakt.plz As PLZ, kontakt.ort As Ort, kontakt.strasse As Strasse, kontakt.telefon As Telefon, kontakt.fax As Fax, kontakt.email As eMail, kontakt.hyperlink As Hyperlink, kontakt.adrzusatz AS Zusatz, kontakt.adrzusatz2 AS Institut, kontakt.tabelle AS Tab, kontakt.typadrid As TypAdr, kontakt.tabpk, personal.pid AS PerID FROM kontakt, personal WHERE personal.pid = kontakt.tabpk AND (kontakt.aikz='A' OR kontakt.aikz IS NULL) AND kontakt.tabelle IN ('personal') AND kontakt.tabpk = [PerID]
SELECT DISTINCT id AS eID, dtxt, ltxt, farbe, utxt FROM einrichtung WHERE id = [eid]
